com.tapad.tapestry

Class TapestryResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tapad.tapestry.TapestryResponse

  • public class TapestryResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about this device and devices connected to it in the device graph, as a result of sending a request to TapestryClient. Accessor methods return a list of values from all devices.

    Examples of getting information from a response: 

     if (response.getData("color").contains("blue"))
  // user has a preference for blue
 if (response.getData("color").isEmpty())
  // user has no color preferences yet
 if (response.getAudiences().contains("buying-car"))
   // user is in a buying car audience
 for (String cookieId : response.getIds("my-cookie"))
   // get every cookie id from connected devices
 if (response.getPlatforms().contains("XBox"))
   // user has an XBox
 if (response.getErrors().size() > 0)
   // errors occurred
 for (TapestryResponse device : response.getDevices())
   // get each device as a separate response

    • Method Detail

      • getDevices

        public java.util.List<TapestryResponse> getDevices()
        Returns information about each device separately as a list of responses. For instance, whereas getPlatforms() normally returns a list of platforms from all devices, calling getPlatforms() on a response returned by this method will return only the platform for a single device.

        Note that TapestryRequest.listDevices() must be called on the request in order for the devices to be contained in the response. Calling getDevices() on devices returned by this method will always return an empty list.

        Returns:
        a list of devices connected to this one or an empty list if none exist

      • getPlatforms

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlatforms()
        Returns the platforms the devices. Not all devices are guaranteed to return a platform.
        Returns:
        a list of platform names

      • getErrors

        public java.util.List<TapestryError> getErrors()
        Returns any errors that occurred when handling this request. The types of errors can be found in the TapestryError class.
        Returns:
        a list of errors

      • getAudiences

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAudiences()
        Returns the audiences that the devices are members of.
        Returns:
        a list of audiences

      • getData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getData(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the values associated with a given key in the devices.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to retrieve from devices
        Returns:
        a list of values

      • getIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIds(java.lang.String type)
        Returns the hardware or cookie ids of the devices.
        Parameters:
        type - The id type to retrieve
        Returns:
        a list of ids
